Nightlight:

Nightlight smiled and  lie down and said bittery"what beast mode could help 
to avoid be captured again?"
The perspective drepess her, and Elita licked her trying to cheer her up "If 
they attemp to do that again I'll show them how fierce I am" growled in  a 
way the child that more than scare, would make every one laught "See?"

Nighlight smiled, then Nightshift was introduced in the medic bay "I 
remember you..."said Nighlight looking at him"You were captured in the 
throne room of the BlackFortress..."


-----Original Message----- 
From: Super Cyclonus
Sent: Thursday, June 30, 2011 10:56 AM

Subject: Re: MEdic Bay
ightshift
> <OLD>
>
> "Who are you?"said Nightlight while she tried to remember when she met
> Bump. She still was lying in the bed waitting that the scanner finished.
> Elita jumped to a side and waited that the check ends
>
> "It's one of the dorctor that attended you while you were sleeping, mom"
> said ELita
>
> "It seemed that passed years since I saw maximals or Autobots" whispered
> Nightlight and looking at Bump she said "I feel much better now that we
> leave the BLackFortress."
>
> Elita waved happyly her tiny tail

<NEW>

BUMP looked down at ELITA and NIGHTLIGHT, mother and daughter as they
were on the medbed. He gave a slight smile, clearly he is
uncomfortable dealing with people on an individual level.

"Your life signs are much improved." He said as he turned to look at
the readouts. "You should soon be able to get out of bed."

Looking back at NIGHTLIGHT after one last glance at the sensor
displays he tried to smaile brighter, but it came out looking a little
forced. "At the moment you still don't have any beast mode set up. Did
you want us to get you set up for the proceedure to reset you?"

Even as BUMP was talking to NIGHTLIGHT the doors to the medbay slid
open and in came NIGHTSHIFT aided by RAMULUS on one side and AIRHAMMER
on the other.

"You need to get to him pretty quick doc." RAMULUS said, "I think he
said his med are wearing off."

BUMP nodded as he walked towards NIGHTSHIFT, scanner in hand. "Main
drive shaft has been cracked." he said quietly. "Coolant and oil
leakage, electrical . . . "

He looked back up at NIGHTSHIFT, "We should have you repaired in short
order, but you may need a little bed rest." BUMP pulled out some sort
of fluid disperssal unit. "This should help you with the pain until we
get you under sedation."

He held it up to NIGHTSHIFT's shoulder and activated it. "Yes, the
pain should be fading even as we speak."

(TAG)

Preston
